TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebBrowserPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebBrowserPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許將 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制網頁瀏覽器控制項能夠在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中執行。 controls the ability of a Web browser control to run in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application. 宣告所允許的範圍需視用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，使用對應的權限類別， 。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class, . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別通常不是在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何要求呼叫程式碼具有無限制的權限來建立網頁瀏覽器控制項。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted permission to create a Web browser control. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)]

Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 建立並傳回 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A corresponding to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由安全性系統，不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫方法。The method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全性資訊屬性目標的類別的中繼資料內儲存套用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系統會存取執行階段資訊。The system accesses the information at run time. 系統會使用傳回来轉換之屬性目標的安全性資訊儲存在中繼資料的可序列化表單。The system uses the returned by to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別的成員不常使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用於在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 。The default value is . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage 這個類別的成員不常使用中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用於在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何要求呼叫程式碼已建立 Web 瀏覽器控制項，以執行安全等級的權限。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has permission to create a Web browser control that runs at a safe level.
